movies.synopsis: Yoon” (Sunny Suwanmethanont) is the busiest 30-year-old freelance graphic designer and retoucher in Thailand. After staying up working for 5 days straight, strange rashes start to appear on Yoon’s body. Yoon eventually relents and brings himself to a public hospital. There, he meets “Doctor Imm” (Davika Hoorne).
movies.title: Heart Attack
